title: Castleton
name: Peak Cavern ('The Devil's Arse')
price: £8.75 (adult), £6.75 (child), discounted joint tickets available with Speedwell Cavern
content: The nearest cavern to the village centre; the huge entrance (the largest in the British Isles) is set in a spectacular gorge below Peveril Castle and can be approached along a public footpath even if you don't pay to enter the cave. The old houses around the stream issuing from the cave are pretty.
